meanings.definition: In a reduplicative manner; by means of reduplication.
meanings.sent1: She repeated the phrase reduplicatively to emphasize her point.
meanings.sent2: He spoke reduplicatively, saying the same thing twice.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled as they reduplicatively chanted the nursery rhyme.
meanings.sent4: The echoes in the canyon bounced reduplicatively, creating a mesmerizing effect.
meanings.sent5: The drum beats reduplicatively echoed through the valley, creating a rhythmic pattern.
